channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: These brain implants speak your mind — even when you don't want to
item.description: Brain-implanted devices that allow paralyzed people to speak can also decode words they imagine, but don't intend to share.

item.title: Unregulated Sexual Stimulants Flood West Africa
item.description: Unregulated sexual stimulants are flooding West Africa, posing major health risks that officials are scrambling to address.

item.title: Texas Republicans Ready to Pass New Redistricting Maps, Just as Trump Wanted

item.title: Voting officials are leaving their jobs at the highest rate in decades
item.description: Some 2 in 5 of all the local officials who administered the 2020 election left their jobs before the 2024 cycle, new research has found.

item.title: Facing Trump’s Threats, Mexico and Canada Draw Closer. Will It Last?
item.description: Mexico and Canada have long viewed each other with indifference or even distrust. They’re now talking about teaming up.
